Package src

Class StaticMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • src.StaticMap
  • public class StaticMap
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains all the information of a map that stay the same over the whole game. it is exclusively used by the map class. Also, it provides the functionality to import the map and to check which fields are reachable.

      • StaticMap

        public StaticMap​(byte[] mapByteArray,
                 boolean serverLog)
        This constructor initializes the static map.
        Parameters:
        mapByteArray - The map in a byte array format.
        serverLog - Indicates if we use server log.

    • Method Detail

      • importMap

        public boolean importMap​(byte[] mapByteArray)
        Method imports a map from the given input stream.
        Parameters:
        mapByteArray - The byte array to import from.
        Returns:
        Returns true if map was imported correctly and false otherwise.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns the infos, the map and the transitions in a formatted string
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object

      • doAStep

        public java.lang.Integer doAStep​(Position pos,
                                 int r)
        Goes one step in the specified direction. If there's a wall or the end of the map it returns null if there's a transition it goes through it.
        Parameters:
        pos - The start position.
        r - Direction to do the step in.
        Returns:
        Returns null if move isn't possible and the direction after the move if it is possible. If a transition changes the direction this is where to get the new one.

      • wasImportedCorrectly

        public boolean wasImportedCorrectly()
        Returns if the map was imported correctly or not.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the map was imported correctly and false otherwise

      • getInitialStonesPerPlayer

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.util.HashSet<Position>> getInitialStonesPerPlayer()
        This function returns the initial stones per player in an ArrayList object of hashsets of positions.
        Returns:
        Returns an Arraylist Object of one hashset per player with their initial stones.

      • getInitialExpansionFields

        public java.util.HashSet<Position> getInitialExpansionFields()
        This function returns the initial expansion fields in a HashSet object.
        Returns:
        Returns a Hashset object with the initial expansion fields.

      • checkForTransition

        public boolean checkForTransition​(Position pos,
                                  int rotation)
        Checks for a transition given the position and rotation.
        Parameters:
        pos - The current position.
        rotation - The rotation in which we are going.
        Returns:
        Returns true if a transition starts from the given position in the given direction.
